text: @realDonaldTrump You fucking dolt. It’s like saying, “Happy 9/11”, or “Happy Coronavirus!” Just when I don’t think a human being can say something more stupid, than your own most recent comment, there you go again... Of course you not human. Just a stupid empty suit, shilling for Vladimir Putin
